greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of parts of each size k^2 in all partitions of n^2 into squares; triangle T(n,k), 1 <= k <= n, read by rows.
link: Christopher Hunt Gribble and Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened (Rows n = 1..21 from Christopher Hunt Gribble)
maple: T:= n-> (p->seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=1..n))(b(n^2, n)):
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0 || i==1, 1+n*x, b[n, i-1] + If[i^2>n, 0, Function[ {g}, g+Coefficient[g, x, 0]*x^i][b[n-i^2, i]]]]; T[n_] := Function[{p}, Table[ Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 1, n}]][ b[n^2, n]]; Table[T[n], {n, 1, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 09 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Christopher Hunt Gribble_, Sep 24 2013
